movies.title: Liao zhai yan tan xu ji zhi wu tong shen
movies.plot: Wu Tung, the lascivious god of Carnal Desire, falls for one of his conquests, only to see her destroyed by other jealous gods. Distraught, he demands the girl's village to send him a virgin every month or face his wrath.
movies.simplePlot: Wu Tung, the lascivious god of Carnal Desire, falls for one of his conquests, only to see her destroyed by other jealous gods. Distraught, he demands the girl's village to send him a virgin every month or face his wrath.

biography.birthName: Anthony Perry (English name) Chau-Sang Wong (Chinese Name)
biography.bio: Anthony Wong Chau-Sang was born to a British father and a Chinese mother. He never knew his father, since the man left his family when Wong was four years old. He trained acting at ATV and later enrolled into the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts. After working in several TV Series, he shot to stardom with hits such as "Hard-Boiled" and his Golden Horse-winning performance in the horrific "The Untold Story." He later appeared in the "Young and Dangerous" films as Dai Fei, a friend to Ekin Cheng's Ho Nam. In 1995, he made his directorial debut with New Tenant. He won his second Hong Kong Film Award for his role as the corrupt police officer Tung in the critically acclaimed "Beast Cops" (1998). Wong continued his success in supporting roles in films such as "Infernal Affairs" (2002) and "Initial D" (2005).
biography.name: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong

biography.bio: Charine Chan was born on November 17, 1967 in Hong Kong. She is an actress and producer, known for Tian ling ling, di ling ling (1986), Meng gui hu li jing (1991) and Huo wu li ren (1989).
biography.name: Charine Chan

biography.bio: King-Man Chik is an actress, known for On the Edge (2006), Whispers and Moans (2007) and Erotic Ghost Story III (1992).
biography.name: King-Man Chik

biography.bio: Yiu-Wah Kwok is an actor, known for Hei xue (1991), Outlaw Brothers (1990) and Liao zhai yan tan xu ji zhi wu tong shen (1991).
biography.name: Yiu-Wah Kwok

biography.bio: Siu Yip Lui is an actor, known for Liao zhai yan tan xu ji zhi wu tong shen (1991).
biography.name: Siu Yip Lui

biography.bio: So Man is an actress, known for Erotic Ghost Story (1987), Chi lang jie (1990) and The Banquet (1991).
biography.name: So Man

biography.bio: Ichijo Sayuri is an actor, known for Liao zhai yan tan xu ji zhi wu tong shen (1991).
biography.name: Ichijo Sayuri

biography.bio: Siu-Yin Tsang is an actress, known for Se jiang (1991), Tang xi feng yue hen (1992) and Se jiang II zhi xie mei gui (1992).
biography.name: Siu-Yin Tsang

biography.bio: Woon-Lok Wong is an actress, known for Ji ya lian (1994) and Liao zhai yan tan xu ji zhi wu tong shen (1991).
biography.name: Woon-Lok Wong

biography.bio: Probably the most famous Hong Kong Category III actress in History even though she hasn't made a film since 1997 when she quit the industry to get married. Famed for her tiny, slim body and disproportionately large implanted breasts, and the lengths she goes to to hide her assets. Her film roles often show self deprecating humour. She knows why she's there, she know's what you want to see, but through cleverly contrived camera angles you never ever see what she promises you might - the famed "Yip Tease". There have long been numerous rumours of an eminent return to movies which have yet to come to fruition.
biography.name: Amy Yip
